entry.title: Google Retires A.I. Chatbot Bard and Releases Gemini, a Powerful New App
entry.summary: As it races to compete with OpenAI's ChatGPT, Google has retired its Bard chatbot and released a more powerful app.

entry.summary:
AI is not “some mysterious, magical, autonomous being,” one critic said.

entry.title: Best iPhone Deals 2024: Take Up to $1,000 Off a New iPhone 15, 14 or SE - CNET
entry.summary: With the latest iPhone 15 series already out and about in the world, you can save on upgrades or snag an earlier model phone for a lot less.

entry.title: How plagiarism-detection programs became an unlikely political weapon
entry.summary: In academia particularly, a charge of plagiarism can be devastating. Software makes it easier than ever to spot attribution errors in published works, which can then be weaponized for political gain.

entry.title: How sneaky scammers are using AI to get you to buy fake Super Bowl tickets
entry.summary: Beware of counterfeits if you're shopping for Super Bowl tickets. Scammers are looking for victims hoping to score last-minute tickets.
